name: showCGGlyphs(_:positions:count:font:textMatrix:attributes:in:)
desc: Renders the glyphs at the specified positions, using the specified attributes.
declaration:
func showCGGlyphs(_ glyphs: UnsafePointer<CGGlyph>, 
        positions: UnsafePointer<CGPoint>, 
            count glyphCount: Int, 
             font: UIFont, 
       textMatrix: CGAffineTransform, 
       attributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] = [:], 
               in CGContext: CGContext)
